main.name: Ronit Shah
main.description: A recent Computer Science graduate from Deakin University with Distinction
main.bio:
“Learning is a stepping  stone to success. Keep learning and Keep Growing.“ 

 Seeking a challenging position as a software developer with a progressive organization that values creativity, innovation, and provides opportunities for growth. I am passionate about designing and implementing software solutions that improve business efficiency and deliver value to end-users. With a strong foundation in programming languages, software development methodologies, and a keen eye for detail, I am confident in my ability to deliver quality work and contribute to the success of the organization. I am enthusiastic to learn and perform new tasks. 

 Discussing opportunities over a cup of coffee is never a bad idea. Feel free to reach out if I can be of any help or if you feel like we could collaborate on something innovative.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to have a chat.
